welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Varennes, Canada! This charming city is known for its historic sites and beautiful scenery. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Varennes has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Hubert Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving airlines from around the world.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving flights within Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, primarily used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with unlimited usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Jean Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mirabel Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mirabel Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
